price: 63. Sidaas oo kale baa loo iilay kuwii Aayadaha Alle dafiri jirey.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ يُؤۡفَكُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَانُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ يَجۡحَدُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: kadhālika yu'faku alladhīna kānū biāyāti al-lahi yajḥadūna
